duties_responsibilities.duty: Sell software maintenance agreements (SMA’s) to end-users across the Americas territory primarily through outbound and inbound telephone sales activities.
Work together with the software product specialists focusing on acquiring new customers and retaining and growing the existing installed base of customers.
Manage your own sales funnel, together with pro-actively seeking out business opportunities via Marcom or other creative business initiatives.
Regular communication of deals, issues and opportunities with the relevant specialist will also be required.

education_certification.credential: Bachelors or Masters Degree in Chemistry, Biology or related technical field. Prior experience not required; up to 2 years of meaningful experience.
